MS.S: Microsoft Azure PowerShell - IoT Device Provisioning Service cmdlets for Azure Resource Manager in Windows PowerShell and PowerShell Core._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_For more information on IoT Device Provisioning Service, please visit the following: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/iot-dps/
